histore.config module¶

Helper methods to access configuration parameters. Configuration parameters are maintained in environment variables.

histore.config.BASEDIR() → str¶

Get value for environment variable HISTORE_BASEDIR. The default value if the variable is not set is $HOME/.histore.

Returns

Return type

string

histore.config.DBCONNECT() → str¶

Get value for environment variable HISTORE_DBCONNECT. The default value for the database connector is not defined (None).

Returns

Return type

string

histore.config.SORTBUFFER() → float¶

Get value for environment variable HISTORE_SORTBUFFER. The default value if the variable is not set is 50% of the available main-memory.

Returns

Return type

float
